t: ŌURA Announces Availability in Amazon Stores - The Pulse Blog
s: October 1, 2024 - Now, Amazon shoppers in the U.S., and as of October 2024, in the UK, can discover and shop ŌURA’s selection of innovative and stylish smart accessories. Customers can browse both Oura Ring Horizon and Oura Ring Heritage in the ŌURA Amazon brand store.

t: Oura Launches Amazon Brand Store for Smart Rings | PYMNTS.com
s: March 8, 2024 - The company is offering its Oura Ring Horizon and Oura Ring Heritage, as well as the Oura Ring Sizing Kit, in an Oura Amazon Brand Store, the smart ring firm said in a Thursday (March 7) blog post.

t: Amazon.com: Oura Ring 4 - Silver - Size 8 - Smart Ring - Size First with Oura Ring 4 Sizing Kit - Sleep Tracking Wearable - Heart Rate - Fitness Tracker - Up to 8 Days of Battery Life
s: It has received some pretty big blows and it still looks brand new. I only wish they had a program to exchange it for weight loss. The ring doesn't get much of the credit for losing weight but i think it definitely helps. I"m also not a fan of paying for the app but i do think it is much better than samsung app. I did see Target lets you return them for 60 days if you purchased with Target Credit Card. Hint Hint Amazon.... ... I’ve had my Oura ...

t: Oura to sell its smart rings on Amazon as Apple, Samsung wearables competition grows

t: Oura Ring. Smart Ring for Fitness, Stress, Sleep & Health.
s: Enhance your health journey with Oura. The Oura Ring provides round-the-clock insights into sleep, fitness, and stress for wellness. Now HSA/FSA eligible.

t: You can finally buy the Oura Ring at Amazon in every style and color — how to shop it now | Tom's Guide
s: March 7, 2024 - The Oura Ring is now available on Amazon in every style and color, starting at $299. You can also purchase Oura Ring accessories through the brand's Amazon store.
